title: My Life Next Door
description: ON ONE SUMMER NIGHT, EVERYTHING CHANGED.Life in Samantha Reed's home is neat and clean and orderlyâ€”precisely planned by her local politician mother. Next door, at the Garretts', things are loud, messy, and irresistible. And when gorgeous Jase Garrett climbs the trellis outside her bedroom and enters her life, she finds herself falling passionately in love with him and everything he brings with him. The only hitch is, she's got to hide it from her mother. Then something unthinkable happens, and Samantha is suddenly faced with an impossible decision. Which perfect family will save her? Or is it time she saved herself?
author: Huntley Fitzpatrick
